isb:document.isb:doctitle: Resources Page: Software, Publications, and News

isb:docsection.name: Software Tools
isb:docsection.label: software
isb:docsection.p:
This section lists selected software tools that were (or are being) developed in collaboration with Hamid Bolouri:
Dizzy, a chemical simulation program [contains an implementation of the Gillespie stochastic simulator
NetBuilder (Hertfordshire, UK)
Java classes developed by the &mainGroup;

ul.li: Systems Biology Markup Language (Pasadena, CA USA)

isb:docsection.name: Active Collaborations
isb:docsection.label: collaborations
isb:docsection.p: Our group has ongoing research collaborations with other labs and organizations outside of the &mainAffiliation;:

ul.li: Biocomputation Group, University of Hertfordshire (Hertfordshire, UK)
Systems Biology Workbench Development Group, Caltech (Pasadena, CA, USA)
ERATO Kitano Symbiotic Systems Project (Tokyo, Japan)

isb:docsection.name: Selected Publications
isb:docsection.label: publications
isb:docsection.p: This section lists selected publications from members of the &mainGroup;. For a more comprehensive list of publications for a particular group member, please refer to the individual's home page. Copies of publications are available by request from Susan Harbison (sharbison at systemsbiology.org).
